1.1.0.name: wordpress/hazen
1.1.0.description: Responsive WordPress theme with multiple homepage layouts, 4 ready to use skins(Black, Blue, Red, Green), two column layout, three column layout, featured posts, social icons, twitter updates, threaded comments and widget support.
